jobDescription: Posted Date: 10/13/2017 Job Category: Analyst - Data Position Title: Data AnalystSalary Range:Location:Desired Skills: Description:  Data Analyst Responsibilities:Perform all levels of data analysis, leveraging current data sources including databases, data and process models, business requirements and other artifacts.Experience gathering, analyzing, evaluating data issues/requests and articulating business requirements and documenting with the ability to conduct User Acceptance Testing (UAT) and perform post production validation of solution implementedAct as liaison between business area and technical team to ensure all parties have complete understanding of issues/requests, requirements and process steps to ensure alignment and successful outcome.Require technical experience with database including MS Access, DB2, and Sybase to perform business data analysis leveraging current data sources including databases, data and process models, business requirements and other artifacts.Maintain process documentation and other relevant records as needed.Required Qualifications:Strong analytical and research skillsStrong written and verbal communication skillsExperience and knowledge of data quality management techniques (data quality, data enrichment, data analysis)Experience with database environments (DB2, Sybase, Oracle)Experience with UNIX and Windows operating systemsSolid experience with data analysis tools, such as SQL and/or SASExperience with Remedy, Clearcase/Clearquest, and MS OfficeExperience in the Financial Services industry, e.g., banking, primary & secondary mortgageFamiliarity with data management practices and data architecture is a plus Equal Opportunity Employer/ Veterans/ Disabled
